Token.Abstract: Class used to represent a Beacon Region.
Beacon Region time before next entry notification.
Beacon Region time before next entry notification.
Initialize a Beacon Region identified by an proximityUUID, an identifier, a label, a message and a timer.

Parameter.Name: proximityUUID
Parameter.Abstract: The unique ID of the beacon being targeted. This value must not be nil.

Parameter.Name: identifier
Parameter.Abstract: A unique identifier to associate with the returned region object. You use this identifier to differentiate regions within your application. This value must not be nil.

Parameter.Name: label
Parameter.Abstract: Custom Beacon Region label.

Parameter.Name: message
Parameter.Abstract: Custom Beacon Region message.

Parameter.Name: timer
Parameter.Abstract: Timer used to limit on beacon region entry notification if user is in the same beacon region.

Parameter.Name: siteId
Parameter.Abstract: The site ID associated with the beacon region.

Token.Abstract: Initialize a Beacon Region identified by an proximityUUID, an identifier, a major value, a label, a message and a timer.
Token.Declaration: - (id)initWithProximityUUID:(NSUUID *)proximityUUID major:(CLBeaconMajorValue)major identifier:(NSString *)identifier label:(NSString *)label message:(NSString *)message timer:(float)timer siteId:(int)siteId

Parameter.Name: proximityUUID
Parameter.Abstract: The unique ID of the beacon being targeted. This value must not be nil.

Parameter.Name: major
Parameter.Abstract: The major value that you use to identify one or more beacons.

Parameter.Name: identifier
Parameter.Abstract: A unique identifier to associate with the returned region object. You use this identifier to differentiate regions within your application. This value must not be nil.

Parameter.Name: label
Parameter.Abstract: Custom Beacon Region label.

Parameter.Name: message
Parameter.Abstract: Custom Beacon Region message.

Parameter.Name: timer
Parameter.Abstract: Timer used to limit on beacon region entry notification if user is in the same beacon region.

Parameter.Name: siteId
Parameter.Abstract: The site ID associated with the beacon region.

Token.Abstract: Initialize a Beacon Region identified by an proximityUUID, an identifier, a major value, a minor value, a label, a message and a timer.
Token.Declaration: - (id)initWithProximityUUID:(NSUUID *)proximityUUID major:(CLBeaconMajorValue)major minor:(CLBeaconMinorValue)minor identifier:(NSString *)identifier label:(NSString *)label message:(NSString *)message timer:(float)timer siteId:(int)siteId

Parameter.Name: proximityUUID
Parameter.Abstract: The unique ID of the beacon being targeted. This value must not be nil.

Parameter.Name: major
Parameter.Abstract: The major value that you use to identify one or more beacons.

Parameter.Name: minor
Parameter.Abstract: The minor value that you use to identify a specific beacon.

Parameter.Name: identifier
Parameter.Abstract: A unique identifier to associate with the returned region object. You use this identifier to differentiate regions within your application. This value must not be nil.

Parameter.Name: label
Parameter.Abstract: Custom Beacon Region label.

Parameter.Name: message
Parameter.Abstract: Custom Beacon Region message.

Parameter.Name: timer
Parameter.Abstract: Timer used to limit on beacon region entry notification if user is in the same beacon region.

Parameter.Name: siteId
Parameter.Abstract: The site ID associated with the beacon region.
